item.title: Version 1.0.0-beta-4
item.description:
Features

  • Refine Library settings UI
  • Log skipped audio files and notify user about it

Fixes

  • Optimize album-art size for different list layouts
  • Optimize list scroll performance
  • Optimize animations to have reduced CPU usage on idle
  • Optimize DB queries to speed up launch & interactions
  • Always ignore duplicates for Discover recommendations
  • Ignore taps on already selected item in Library sidebar
  • Prevent redrawing Track details sidebar on tab switching
  • Fix Artwork loading logic to improve scroll performance
  • Fix Grid item height by preventing multiline titles
  • Fix marquee text color for dark mode state changes
  • Unify playlist creation to handle different flows efficiently
  • Disable Library action buttons while scanning is active
  • Refresh library category cache on folder updates
  • Hide sort button in tracks list headers for Table layout
  • Fix track views to handle playback and scrolling correctly
  • Fix tracks not loading correctly for pinned artists or albums
  • Improve pinned items load performance and artists computation
  • Fix Play and Shuffle button behavior on Entity & Playlist views
  • Fix pinned item count query to prevent app lockups
  • Fix Sparkle config for sandboxed app setup

Full Changelog

item.title: Version 1.0.0-beta-3
item.description:
Features

  • Add automatic app updates support using Sparkle
  • Improve album art extraction logic to handle multiple formats
  • Make category switching in Library sidebar instantaneous
  • Improve Library sidebar's category dropdown UX to be legible
  • Improve sort button UX to be legible
  • Refine Create Playlist button and sheet UX

Fixes

  • Fix Library sidebar filter placeholder text to change correctly
  • Fix content scrollbars to be interactive to mouse events
  • Prevent moving app window by dragging over tab buttons
  • Restore Edit menu to allow using text shortcuts
  • Fix `Unknown *` items in Library sidebar not showing tracks
  • Defer Menubar initialization to prevent occasional crash
  • Use unified GPU-driven activity animation for consistency
  • Improve Playlist tracks add/remove performance and UX
  • Show confirmation before deleting a playlist
  • Fix tracks not showing up in Folders view
